Message:
I learned how to
grip a sword before
I could speak,

and how to use one
before I could read.

Now, I’ve cut ties with
everything irrelevant
to swordplay,

following a life that’s
one with the sword.

After all, my goal was
to outshine the founder!

I couldn’t dedicate anything
less than my entire life.

The journey was an uphill battle,
constantly making me feel as if
I was going to vomit blood.

I went overboard with the training,
losing count of all the bones I’d broken.

Then, after years of
life with the sword,
I was made the next
head of the family...
and inherited the founder’s
twin blades and techniques.

Everything I dedicated
to the sword has paid off.
Now, it’s time for
my legend to begin!
I fell victim to a disease.
